external_games.name: Dikembe Mutombo's 4 1/2 Weeks to Save the World

name: Dikembe Mutombo's 4 1/2 Weeks to Save the World
summary: An absurd 16-bit advergame released in 5 parts. It chronicles the efforts of NBA star Dikembe Mutombo as he and a talking bear try to save the world from the impending Mayan apocalypse.
